file_content.text: My team's sacrifice protected the Empire.
No amount of treachery could protect CEC from your wrath.
CEC is yours to conquer.
We have moved the Czerka hull-cracker to a secure location.
Alert me once you have the detonation codes. I'll be ready to move on the hull-cracker.
Darth Charnus. We are ready.
Czerka's forces swarm like confused insects. They've regrouped to defend the hive--leaving the hull-cracker's storage facility vulnerable.
Czerka is ruled by fear. Soon their explosive will be ours.
All according to plan.
Czerka reeks of panic. We must take their explosive now.
I can smell their terror.
Czerka played right into our hands. Now, we take their explosive.
Right on schedule.
Czerka's dead center in my crosshairs. Time to take their explosive.
All according to plan.
What's our next move?
Now we take the hull-cracker.
Commander Jastal's team is in place, ready to grab the hull-cracker. You'll lead a more direct attack.
Your target is Brall Tavar. He's Czerka Corellia's figurehead, the definition of corporate sleaze.
Brall Tavar has the hull-cracker's detonation codes. Without them, the bomb's useless.
Break into his executive offices, get the detonation codes, then call me. My men will already have the hull-cracker.
Tell your men to be ready for the final assault, Commander. I'll deal with Brall Tavar at once.
I'll get the codes.
We'll have the hull-cracker by the time you have those codes.
Czerka will go down in flames.
Delightful. Punish Czerka for their defiance, then contact Commander Jastal. He'll have the hull-cracker secured by the time he hears from you.
I'm not so sure about this.
The longer you stall, the more time Czerka has to align their defenses.
Procure the detonation codes, then contact Commander Jastal. He'll have the hull-cracker secured by the time he hears from you.
Czerka's camps are destroyed. How do we get the hull-cracker?
I'll connect you to Darth Charnus at once.
My ship afforded a spectacular view of your work.
Rest up while you can. This is our only outpost in Czerka territory.
